workflow.name: Name of the workflow (only words, '-', '_')
workflow.description: Description of the workflow and its purpose

tasks.name: Task name

dependencies.id: Identifier for the task or artifact

parameters.description: Here custom parameters for the task can be defined.

results: Expected artifact identifiers created by this task
tasks.priority: Number representing the priority of the task, lower value means higher priority (Type integer)

retryPolicy.maxRetryCount: Number of times this task can be retried on failure (Type integer)
retryPolicy.retryDelay: Delay between retries, e.g., 5s, 1m | Integer representing time in ms
retryPolicy.exponentialBackoff: Boolean indicating whether exponential backoff is used, if true the delay will be exponential starting at the retry delay

tasks.timeout: Timeout for task execution, e.g., 30m | Integer representing time in ms

onError.action: What happens when an error occurs (retry, cancel, escalate)
onError.escalationWorkflow: Optional workflow to trigger if error cannot be resolved

completionCriteria.id: Identifier for the task or artifact

workflow.cleanupPolicy: Policy for cleaning up artifacts after workflow completion (e.g., immediate, after 1 day)
